query:
UPDATE batches
            SET deleted_at = NOW(),
                cancelling_at = CASE
                    WHEN completed_at IS NULL AND failed_at IS NULL AND cancelled_at IS NULL
                        THEN COALESCE(cancelling_at, NOW())
                    ELSE cancelling_at
                END,
                cancelled_at = CASE
                    WHEN completed_at IS NULL AND failed_at IS NULL AND cancelled_at IS NULL
                        THEN COALESCE(cancelled_at, NOW())
                    ELSE cancelled_at
                END
            WHERE id = $1
              AND deleted_at IS NULL
